get.description: This API fetches the details of a particular help center user.

patch.description: This API helps update the details of a particular help center user.

post.description: This API adds a user to the groups specified.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of labels associated with a user, based on the limit defined.

post.description: This API removes the labels you specify from a particular user.
This API removes a user from the groups specified.
This API permanently deletes all identifying information about a user from your help center.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of help center users, based on the limit defined. It also helps you search for specific users.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Additional information related to the user. Value allowed is @count@.

schema.description: Additional information related to the user. Value allowed is @count@.

parameters.name: lastActivityStartTime
parameters.description: Starting time of the time range in which the comments should have been created. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

schema.description: Starting time of the time range in which the comments should have been created. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

parameters.name: lastActivityEndTime
parameters.description: Starting time of the time range in which the comments should have been created. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

schema.description: Starting time of the time range in which the comments should have been created. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

post.description: This API assigns the labels you specify to a particular user.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of user groups in a help center, based on the limit defined.

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: emailAddress to fetch the exact user details
Activation status of the users to list
Activation status of the user. Values supported are @ACTIVE@ and @DISABLED@.

anonymizedName.description: Display name of the user in tickets and community topics after anonymization

status.description: Activation status of the user. Values supported are @ACTIVE@ and @DISABLED@.
